ygData.subject: Re: Deeper Permafrost
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I don t know any way in other than the ramp from vox s room or the pits. Is there one? Does anyone else find it odd that the ice giants are so badly
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, Jan 24/00, Rokenn Swiftsong <rokenn@...> wrote:
> From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
>
> I know of the bear pits in Permafrost (fortunatly I have never been feared
> into them). The few times a bear or dire wolf has come to join the party at
> Vox they provided a nice extra bit of experience. I was wondering if anyone
> has ever tried to pentrate down there for some experience camping. Also the
> loot ain't too bad for money, I got a giant dire wolf pelt that sold for
> nearly 7 plat. Better and lighter then most FS weapon loot.

I don't know any way in other than the ramp from vox's room or the pits.
Is there one?

Does anyone else find it odd that the ice giants are so badly itemized
while the fire giants are an event in themselves for loot?

--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
